introduction.en_us:
# Whisper [中文](https://github.com/ltBerryshdo/Whisper/tree/main/./README.md)
A **[MCDReforged](https://github.com/Fallen-Breath/MCDReforged) plugin**
More plugins click *[here](https://github.com/MCDReforged/PluginCatalogue)* [![issue](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/ltBerryshdo/Whisper?color=orange)](https://github.com/ltBerryshdo/Whisper/issues) [![Github stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ltBerryshdo/Whisper)]() ## Description Send some private message to others at same time in easier way.
Use triggers (default'**') to send private messages to everyone the player specifies. ## How to use 1. Use `!!whisper ` command add player(s) can receive private message 2. Prepare a writable_book and rename it to "MCDRwhisper" and place it in the hotbar 3. Write your whispered words in writable_book~, be careful not to break lines 4. Then enter the default trigger ** in the chat bar 5. They should be able to hear from you~ 6. Before whispering the next time, remember to empty the contents of the writable_book ~~（I originally wanted to clear it automatically, but I won't use /data command）~~ 7. Just that, you can avoid using commands such as /tell to send messages to different people one by one ## Attention - The message to be sent needs to be written in a writable_book called "MCDRwhisper" in the hotbar - Make sure there is no LINE BREAKS in the message to be sent - Before whispering the next time, remember to EMPTY the contents of the writable_book ## Dependencies | Plugin ID | Requirement | | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- | | [minecraft_data_api](https://github.com/MCDReforged/PluginCatalogue/blob/catalogue/plugins/minecraft_data_api/readme.md) | * | ## Command | command | description | | ------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | `!!whisper` | Display this message | | `!!whisper` `` | Add target players to receive private message(Multiple parameters are acceptable) | | `!!whisper` `list` | Display all the player in the list | | `!!whisper` `clear` | Delete the list | | `!!whisper` `delmum` `` | Delete player(Multiple parameters are acceptable) | | `!!whisper` `cp` `` | Copy someone's contacts |
introduction.zh_cn:
# Whisper [English](https://github.com/ltBerryshdo/Whisper/tree/main/./README_EN.md)
A **[MCDReforged](https://github.com/Fallen-Breath/MCDReforged) plugin**
More plugins click *[here](https://github.com/MCDReforged/PluginCatalogue)* [![issue](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/ltBerryshdo/Whisper?color=orange)](https://github.com/ltBerryshdo/Whisper/issues) [![Github stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ltBerryshdo/Whisper)]() ## 简介 更便捷地对一群人同时说悄悄话
大声密谋（bushi)
使用触发器（默认为 '**' ），向玩家指定的所有人发送私密信息。 ## 如何使用 1. 使用`!!whisper `命令添加能收到悄悄话的玩家（们） 2. 准备一本 书与笔 并且重命名为 “MCDRwhisper”，将其放在快捷栏中 3. 在书与笔中写下你的悄悄话~，注意不要换行 4. 然后在公共聊天栏输入触发器，默认为 ** 5. TA们应该就能收到你的来信了~ 6. 在下一次说悄悄话前，记得清空书与笔里的内容 ~~（本来想自动清除的，结果不会用/data命令）~~ 7. 就酱，可以不用/tell等命令一条条给不同的人发消息了 ## 注意 - 发送的消息请储存在快捷栏里名为 “ MCDRwhisper ” 的书与笔中。 - 确保待发送的消息没有 换行符 - 在发送下一条消息前，请先 清空 书与笔的内容 ## 依赖 | Plugin ID | Requirement | | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- | | [minecraft_data_api](https://github.com/MCDReforged/PluginCatalogue/blob/catalogue/plugins/minecraft_data_api/readme.md) | * | ## 命令 | command | description | | ------------------------------- | ---------------------- | | `!!whisper` | 查看命令列表 | | `!!whisper` `` | 添加玩家作为悄悄话的倾听者(可接受多个参数) | | `!!whisper` `list` | 列出列表中所有的玩家 | | `!!whisper` `clear` | 删除列表和玩家 | | `!!whisper` `delmum` `` | 删除玩家(可接受多个参数) | | `!!whisper` `cp` `` | 把另一个玩家的通讯录复制过来 |
